description: Options for the hovered point. These settings override the normal state options when a point is moused over or touched.

children.name: animation
children.description: Animation setting for hovering the graph in line-type series.

children.name: brightness
children.description:
How much to brighten the point on interaction. Requires the main color to be defined in hex or rgb(a) format.

In styled mode, the hover brightening is by default replaced with a fill-opacity set in the .highcharts-point:hover rule.

children.name: enabled
children.description: Enable separate styles for the hovered series to visualize that the user hovers either the series itself or the legend.

children.name: lineWidth
children.description: The pixel width of the line representing the OHLC point.
